0x00010000  ldr r0, [pc, #44]
0x00010004  ldr r1, [pc, #44]
0x00010008  ldrb r3, [r1]
0x0001000c  str r3, [r0]
0x00010010  add r1, r1, #1
0x00010014  ldrb r3, [r1]
0x00010018  cmp r3, #0
0x0001001c  bne 0xC
0x00010020  b [r15, #0x-8]
0x00010024  68 65 6c 6c
0x0001002c  6f 2c 20 77
0x00010030  6f 72 6c 64
0x00010034  0a 00 00 00
0x00010038  00 10 1f 10
0x0001003c  24 00 01 00
